website_summaries.verdict: This milky makeup remover formula helps to dissolve stubborn mascara and long-wearing lipstick.
pros: The Bi-Phase liquid has an oil phase to dissolve oil-based products, and a water phase that uses gentle cleansers to wipe away makeup from the skin, eyes, and lips
Skin around the eyes and lips is softened and hydrated
cons: May not be strong enough for heavy makeup wearers

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Bi-facil
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a recommendation from a friend. This works well. It removes waterproof eyeliner and mascara without burning my eyes and without having to apply a lot of pressure. Would repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing matte lipstick
customer_reviews.text: It works well on that matte lipstick that never comes off. It doesnt leave much oil residue. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Hall

customer_reviews.title: FIVE Star Makeup Remover
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Dual Action Make Up Remover for years. After trying many other removers, I found this to be the most gentle on my eyes and face. It removes all types of make up, mascara and eyeliner! Does not dry out your skin and I have very dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper!

customer_reviews.title: Great Remover
customer_reviews.text: This feels good and works great. Very moisturizing. Smells clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: TScrapper

customer_reviews.title: excellent service
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that I've used for several years and am pleased to have found such a reliable source for it.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: Gentle eye-makeup remover that works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years. I'm happy to finally see it on Amazon. Whenever I ran out it was a search and procure mission to find my next 2 bottles to purchase. In between these missions I've tried other eye makeup removers and they have always stung my eyes and/or not worked as well. This product does a great job removing eye and other makeup. It is also gentle; it doesn't sting my eyes and I've never had it irritate my skin, which is a bit sensitive, in any way. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mo by the Beach

customer_reviews.title: So glad to find this on Amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this makeup remover from another website, but when I couldn't get it there, I checked Amazon.com. Happily, Amazon came through and the price was less than what I had been paying for it. This is absolutely the best makeup remover. It is gentle, yet takes off everything beautifully--even hard to remove eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: T. Casteleiro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of removing eye liner and mascara. Stings a little, though.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Ruck

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the only remover I use. If I run out by accident I will wait until more arrives. It does not cause any reactions to the skin or eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Hudi

customer_reviews.title: this is the best make up remover i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: not sensitive to my eyes and quickly removes all debris. i have tried several over the years and this is the best
customer_reviews.author: pammiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been buying this product from Pree Cosmetics for over 2 years! To find out that I can now buy it on amazon is amazing! This makeup remover will remove any stubborn waterproof lip paint and eye liner that I use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Makeupdiva

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this product for several years now.
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it remove any eye makeup perfectly,painlessly, and without causing allergies, I also found my lashes to be stronger and growing better. Perfect side effect.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena S

product_meta.title: Jolie Dual Action Makeup Remover - For Eyes & Lips - 4.3 fl. oz.
product_meta.description: Oil-and-water phase formula especially effective on stubborn mascara and long-lasting lipsticks. The Bi-Phase liquid has an oil phase to quickly dissolve oil based products, and a water phase that uses gentle action cleansers to quickly unlock today’s modern seals and float makeup off the skin, eyes and lips. When shaken, the phases work together to sweep away makeup and impurities, leaving skin fresh and ready for your next act. 4.4 Fl. oz. (132 ml)
feature_bullets: This innovative formula combines the effectiveness of an oil phase to dissolve stubborn mascara and long-wearing lipstick, and a water phase to help float it away.
When shaken, the phases work quickly to sweep away makeup, leaving skin comfortable, fresh and satiny smooth.
Gentle ingredients softens and smoothes dry skin around the eyes and lips. Leaves skin feeling soft and luxuriously comfortable.
Ophthalmologist tested to be gentle enough for the most sensitive eyes.
Formulated without: Parabens, Sulfates, Phthalates or Synthetic Fragrances.
